posts.name: Elaine
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.37 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group .

Release notes:

  • Now you can easily see all of your unread chats by pulling down in the chat list. Quickly filter what’s unread, but feel free to take your time while deciding whether or not to leave them on read.

Let us know about any issues you experience! Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.36 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.37.0.436-beta

77 new commits since 7.36.0.428-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.37 [1]

  • Add toggle to enable link'n'sync for internal builds [2]

  • Up internal linknsync timeout to ridiculous levels [3]

  • Avoid double-archiving phone number contacts [4]

  • link'n'sync backup spot fixes [5]

  • Fix filter by unread icon rendering in dark mode [6]

  • Omit IV from copyToMediaTier request [7]

  • Dont export expireStartDate for non-expiring messages [8]

  • Just present backup errors UI directly from chat list VC [9]

  • Don't link'n'sync if relinking [10]

  • Add Call Links to backups [11]

  • Fix backup of My Story and story privacy/view mode [12]

  • Fix document picker to work for both device and sim [13]

  • Update to LibSignal v0.60.2 [14]

  • Add a "purpose" enum to MBAuthCredentialManager [15]

  • Migrate to LibSignal key derivation [16]

  • Move lastVisibleSortId store into its own class [17]

  • Set lastVisibleRowId on threads and wasRead on messages when restoring [18]

  • Migrate to new Media/Message backup auth credentials [19]

  • Respect timeout on TSRequest [20]

  • Combine transactions for reactive profile keys [21]

  • Clean up some noisy lines [22]

  • Don't wait as long for link'n'sync on internal builds [23]

  • Improve post-backup FullTestSearchIndexer error handling [24]

  • Mark backup error logs as fatal or not [25]

  • Run validator on link'n'sync export [26]

  • Add internal settings button to validate backup [27]

  • Add cancellation support to http requests [28]

  • Fix large envelope handling [29]

  • Use MonotonicDate for RESTSessionManager [30]

  • Update protobufs for GSEs [31]

  • Adopt new endpoint when creating groups [32]

  • Clean up DeviceSleepManager [33]

  • Make GroupV2Snapshot into a struct [34]

  • Handle recoverable send errors more quickly [35]

  • Use new async OWSUrlSession methods [36]

  • Consolidate error handling for OWSURLSession [37]

  • Expose local file backup export in internal [38]

  • remove dead code [39]

  • remove UIView+Promise and make an async version [40]

  • remove UIView+Async [41]

  • remove dead code: DB.writePromiseWithTxCompletion [42]

  • Skip archiving gv1 threads in backup without failing [43]

  • replace group call debounce promisekit with task [44]

  • Remove debug toggle [45]

  • Add Signal colors [46]

  • Update app colors [47]

  • Update Signal logo [48]

  • Update Signal colors for SwiftUI [49]

  • Ignore read cache when updating TSAttachment schema version [50]

  • Move callbacks for reg requests out of Tasks [51]

  • Fix remaining pull-to-filter scroll view glitches [52]

  • Add warnings when notifications are delayed [53]

  • Don’t delay notifications in the foreground [54]

  • Dont owsFailDebug when MRBK is missing [55]

  • Get wasRead state from backup call protos not directional details [56]

  • Restore TSGroupMember from backups [57]

  • Unmark text when setting to nil [58]

  • Bump rexml from 3.3.6 to 3.3.9 […] [59]

  • Remove alpha channel from app icon [60]

  • Use weak ref to work around race tearing down KVO observation [61]

  • Don't back up group story messages [62]

  • Update Fastlane to 2.225.0 [63]

  • Remember which threads were gv1 so we can silently drop archiving their messages [64]

  • Handle DM timer updates in gv1 groups that migrated to gv2 [65]

  • Check Xcode Cloud/GitHub Action Xcode versions [66]

  • Remove unused CDS code [67]

  • Asyncify CDS lookups [68]

  • Simplify & fix warning in ContactDiscoveryError [69]

  • Include Signal colors in the share extension target [70]

  • remove dead code [71]

  • misc cleanup [72]

  • Simplify ChatListFilterControl with independent isTracking property […] [73]

  • Add support for unknown call link restrictions [74]

  • Update in-app app icon previews [75]

  • Update release notes [76]

  • Update translations [77]

posts.cooked: Liking the new “Signal locked” screens in light/dark mode

The „edited“ Text is not displayed under the message at some times any more:

(False)

(Normal)

posts.name: link ✦
posts.cooked:
1125×2184 80.5 KB
1125×2184 68.4 KB
Loving the tweaks to the Signal logo! The new darker blue looks really nice and bold, especially next to WhatsApp’s logo, and the rounding of the tail’s border adds a lovely polish.

Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.36 release

All of this is still present except the call back button thing:
Previous post

Still a thing in 7.37

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.36 release

posts.cooked:
Gotta disagree strongly here, I think the new color is very ugly.
Please add an option to use the old colors or add the old one back as an additional icon to choose from in the “appearance” settings.

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.38 release.
